function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of routine use of upper room germicidal UV in buildings where airborne infection is likely","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne infection transmission, including COVID-19 and pandemic influenza","Mitigation":"Wider implementation of air disinfection technology in public settings and prioritization of high-risk locations","Technologies":"Germicidal UV for upper room air disinfection","People":"Residents, visitors, and staff of public buildings and facilities","Owner":"Facility managers, public health officials, and building owners"},{"Description":"Underestimation of the necessity of air disinfection in a wider variety of public settings","Impact":"Increased community transmission of airborne infections, leading to higher risk of outbreaks and pandemics","Mitigation":"Education and awareness campaigns on the importance of air disinfection in public settings, especially in high-risk environments","Technologies":"Education and awareness campaigns, germicidal UV technology","People":"General public, policymakers, and public health organizations","Owner":"Public health organizations, government agencies, and advocacy groups"},{"Description":"Neglect of homes as priorities for air disinfection","Impact":"Potential delay rather than prevention of airborne infection transmission within households","Mitigation":"Education on the benefits of air disinfection in households and the use of effective technologies for home settings","Technologies":"Education on air disinfection, germicidal UV technology for home use","People":"Household members and visitors","Owner":"Public health organizations, government agencies, and advocacy groups"}]}
